website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable collagen facial cream that includes other ingredients to make your skin softer and smoother.
pros: Contains collagen, elastin, and safflower seed oil to moisturize your skin and give you a natural glow
Absorbs well into the skin without clogging pores
cons: Would be more convenient in a pump container

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic St. Ives Timeless
customer_reviews.text: This is a total Fake! I’m so frustrated about this product. I have been using this kind of (original) St. Ives but this one sucks! The smell and it’s texture is a give away. I just hope Amazon won’t sell this. So disappointed customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not Timeless Skin Formula
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it was the same cream in the picture as it has been discontinued and I havent been able to find it anywhere.This is not the same cream that is pictured. This is the new formula of the Timeless Skin cream called Renewing. This has less collegen and elastin in it.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Fast absorbing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have an oily combination skin, so finding the right moisturizer is a little tricky. If you are looking for a fast absorbing moisturizer, this is for you. The scent is lovely and it moisturizes my skin throughly. I have been a cetaphil user for years now and I have never really been satisfied with it because it sits on my face and it feels greasy. This is my new favorite moisturizer now!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, non-greasy and my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, non-greasy and anti-aging qualities. I have been using this for several years. I tried some other products here the last year because I thought I needed something more trailered for my age group (35) and thought maybe a more expensive brand would work better. I haven’t found anything that is as lightweight and just overall best results like this. I attribute my more youthful facial skin to my years of use of this lotion. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product twice a day for a couple of years. Not only does it feel good on my skin but also it moisturizes very effectively and has helped to relieve my face of the effects of rosacea. I am totally satisfied and heartily recommend this skin treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After using very pricey creams and not feeling they were completely worth it, a friend recommended this product. I now use twice daily and my skin looks and feels great. I still do ocassionally use the other brands as well but now using both they last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Callecoco

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw on Pinterest that it was a good dupe for a higher priced product. I doubt that it is quite as good as the high price item but I like it. I use it over a serum. It goes a long way and it's a huge jar so I probably won't have to buy more for quite a while. The one negative is that it is not fragrance free. It's not a really strong fragrance but I would prefer none.
customer_reviews.author: Prime shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Great body moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for several years, especially since St Ives took the mineral oil out of their collagen lotion. There's nothing like mineral oil to smooth dry skin. We live in a dry climate, and dry skin is a recurring problem. Put it on after a shower for best results.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Van Doren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 6 years. It is absolutely wonderful. It makes my skin so smooth and soft. I use it more often during the hot summer months. It keeps my skin from drying out. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell/face rash
customer_reviews.text: The scent is extremely piney. A very unpleasant smell to put all over my face. Good moisturizing consistency though. Also I'm pretty sure my skin has been developing tiny bumps all over, especially my forehead, because of this cream. Might be allergic to it. A huge bargain for the amount but not good quality for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon V

customer_reviews.title: Better than you think!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for decades. It's misleading in that it is NOT expensive or advertised widely. What it is, is effective. With regular use you will see wrinkles and stretch marks literally disappear. I'm 76 and am told I look fifty or so. I give credit to this product and my supplements. Try it. You have nothing to lose and, believe me, everything to gain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vargo

customer_reviews.title: It works, it doesn't irritate, and it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 30 years, and I have tried other things, but always came back to it, because it is the best lotion I've ever used, and reasonably priced. I have found that some other lotions irritate my eyes or my skin or both, or feel oily or sticky. This lotion does none of those things. I can use it all over my body, making it convenient as well. The scent is very subtle and pleasant. I have nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Foodlover

customer_reviews.title: rebranding/less collagen
customer_reviews.text: giving this 3 stars because it’s still the only nighttime face cream at an affordable price that doesn’t make my sensitive skin go haywire, but i received the new “renewing” formula which has less collagen and elastin than the old “timeless” formula. bring back the old stuff, st. ives!
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: A huge tub of stuff that works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for fine lines on 30- something sensitive skin! Noted improvement after 2-3 days of use in am and at bed time. Feels a bit sticky after applying but that goes away quickly. I started applying it on the backs of my hands to decrease the look of "old lady hands" and it works there too! All in all great results at a price that can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwmn

customer_reviews.title: My #1 face cream!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this timeless skin cream... It took about 2 months for me to begin to see a difference but I have seen a difference in fine lines on my face. It's not good as a mosterizer as it does nothing for my dry skin, but it's great for my face! Feels refreshing when I put it on and best of all, this does NOT break me out which I'm prone to.... Also works as a makeup remover! I also use it as a facial wash. This was a great price for 2 containers and so I couldn't resist!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: I love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. I have been using it for over 25 years. I am 58 years old and have very few wrinkles. However, it has become very hard to find in regular drug stores and grocery stores which seem to prefer many products that are very pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette629

customer_reviews.title: Do you really want the mess sent back to you?
customer_reviews.text: I love the moisturizer but both jars cracked and broken, leaked all over inside bag. Do you really want me to send it back? I can't use it like it is, rather have replacement in better packaging. It's a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found soothing, cooling, comforting facial cream, not too heavy or salty at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved what collagen does to my skin, right before my eyes! Could never find the right product in the store. I love St. Ives products, and as I was reading St. Ives labels (I was in Amaon) I found a two container order at a really, really good price and placed my order. In just one or two steps I couldn't believe I found what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and up until now could NEVER find anything that adequately moisturized my face. Most creams sink right in and leave my face looking as parched and dry as before application. NOT THIS MOISTURIZER. A small dollup leaves my face looking and feeling quenched...ALL DAY. This has never happened. Price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mschelle

customer_reviews.title: Scent and refreshing feeling
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer, I have been using it for years now, and it’s amazing. Feels fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Borje

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the original St Ives I had used for years, but found this instead. The scent is different, but not overwhelming and does not linger. Very light and when you are old and dried out like I am, it absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: mammasawnT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product for quite a few years. It works well on my skin and the price is right on. I have never had a break out using this product. I like it because of the quantity. I pretty much slather it on my neck. I have used this product for quite a few years. It works well on my skin and the price is right on. I have never had a break out using this product. I like it because of the quantity. I pretty much slather it on my neck, more so than on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, low-no scent, gentle
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the simplicity. No film, sticky, or greasy “leftover”. And CHEAP!! Also. O fragrance as far as I can tell. I put it on my face and body. I’ve reordered several times and won’t stop, as long as the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Light weight moisture w/ firming
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream although it’s so lightweight it feels like a lotion. I use it from head to ankles. I noticed firming of my skin including bossum which was a nice bonus☺️
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Runny lotion
customer_reviews.text: It was very runny and my skin is very dry soil felt like I had to glob on a lot of lotion just to get moisten my skin after hoping out of the shower. I been using this for the last few months and haven’t notice much of a difference. Overall, I won’t be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Helps my acne
customer_reviews.text: This is the only moisturizer that helps my acne. I’ve tried more expensive moisturizers for my dry skin such as neutrogena and this works so much better. Plus it lasts a thousand times longer. I pretty much can’t live without this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: awesome moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it religiously for over 3 years and I haven't had a problem with it, it has all the features of a perfect moisturizer that I like i.e lightweight, nourishing and hydrating. I absolutely love it. Totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's hard to find this in stores. I live in a rural area so finding it on Amazon is great for me! Have been using this moisturizer daily for at least 10 years or more. I love it, not greasy, very smooth and feels light on my face. A large jar too! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: I specifically bought this one because it had the old ...
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this one because it had the old formula pictured. What I received was the new formula. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: terrah

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizer ever! I will use it on body or face. Highly recommend for knees and elbows. Love how light weight it feels, fast drying, and good smell. Best of all is the price is great and no aluminum! Been using for a year. Order the two pack if you’ll be using on more than your face.
customer_reviews.author: Cody55

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! ALL I introduced to it love it too! Unbelievable how great at such a low cost. Wasn't expecting it to be SO good. At the price thought HAD to give it a try! Sure glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Romano

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and rich!
customer_reviews.text: Read an article in a women’s magazine and started using this years ago. I have very sensitive skin and this is gentle and effective.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Great lotion which seems to soak into the skin versus lay on top of it. Scent is mild. Great for unisex use. Lasts a long time. Great value!

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cream. The change is visible immediately

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is not a high quality, fancy skin cream but it is super lightweight, not greasy at all and just a nice light moisturizer if you have normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Its OKAY.. non-irritating. It does provide moisture, but that's about it. I put it on after a warm shower- its good for body and face. It smells nice and clean, and doesn't leave a residue. As for anti-aging, I don't think its anything earth-shattering, just a good, gentle moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid value
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for quite a while. It's non-greasy and non-fragrant, leaving my skin smooth and fresh-looking. This two-pack is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Bang 4 your buck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my go to and a family fav! My Mom & GMa used it too!! I moisturize in the am and @ nite. My skin is good! I am a senior. I recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Normal
customer_reviews.text: I used for mi body, the more important ingredient is collagen and it’s the last in the list

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Always good results.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years, and it works so good. It really is the best value for money that does what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!!! I have very sensitive skin and have had NO reaction to it. It's scent is very mild if any at all. My skin has never been softer!!!!! Definitely worth the money. And it will last a while because you don't need much!

customer_reviews.title: Not for me/possibly received old or defectve product?
customer_reviews.text: I have always had good luck with St. Ives products and this was recommended to me by a friend. I have been using it as a night cream and it goes on/feels heavy on my skin yet I wake up with dry patches on my face. I gave it a chance for a few weeks but went back to my old anti wrinkle night cream and the dry patches went away immediately.

customer_reviews.title: This was a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my 50s. First use on my faceand woke up the next morning wit a zit on my nose. Will use it on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Foland

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The light weight feel of this product is great. Soaks in fast and leaves my skin soft!!! Highly recommend this, especially since St Ives always have great products.

customer_reviews.title: Great face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for almost 4 yrs. It is very light and leaves my skin soft and moisturized. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful love And trust Saint Ives Products
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to love I am picky what I put into my body and on my skin. I trust Saint Ives products all of them Much more affordable Feels good on my face No non toxic ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Awaiting my younger skin smile.

customer_reviews.title: Best Daily Moisturizer

It is thick and luxurious, and really, truly moisturizes your face like nothing else. The price is very reasonable, and the ingredients collagen and elastin are the best thing you can put on your skin. Also has a wonderful aroma.

This is the only moisturizer not making my skin feels oily or shiny. Rather, it feels so soft. I hope I get greater results after a while.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to moisturizer. Love, love, love the smoothness and the way it melts into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: St. Ives Renewing Collagen & Elastin Moisturizer, 10 oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Firms Skin While Minimizing The Appearance Of Fine Lines For A Smooth, Visibly Healthy, Younger Looking Skin Enriched With Collagen And Elastin Proteins Suitable For All Skin Types
